title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When I press Ok, I get the error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue is that setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. By setting the output location first, an illegal state is created.
SR: To reproduce:1. Open the project settings dialog.2. Set the output location and classpath in a single operation.3. Press Ok and observe that the error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src' no longer occurs.
